commit message: BUGFIX: more robust sensor configuration. There should be no more crashes with sensors having an unexpected number of channels

BUGFIX: appearantly there are some devices which hog sensors. Not getting a sensorevent means the screen stays blank -> No way to fix this, so let's at least tell the user that we are waiting for something.
BUGFIX: Prevent the legend from painting over the x label and give the graph a bit more space vertically
